title: Feasters: An Apocalyptic Tale
description: Hope. Each night, in this Post-Apocalyptic zombie world, teenage vampires, Kieran, Emily, and Andrew, search for hope. Hope that one day, all of this will be over. Hope for anything other than the Feasters that roam the land. When an unscheduled "rescue run" isn't all that it appears to be, they will have to rely on their close family bond and primitive instincts in order to survive.
author: Solomon Petchers
